duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete individual tax returns and provide tax planning and audit support
Effectively communicate in person and in writing with clients and colleagues
Meet all IRS and applicable state requirements, and complete required continuing education
Conduct financial analysis and bookkeeping duties in a fast-paced environment
Provide sales and marketing support, encouraging bilingual candidates to apply

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (CPA or Enrolled Agent certification preferred)
